1135420.name: Zeminator Demo
1135420.description:
Zeminátor!

Political situation in the great country of former Demo-Bohemian Kingdom is on the edge by the demo-war between the Full version and the Demo version. But there's a one demo-man. The Man, the President, the Demo. With the cool demo-arcade visual style from the demo-eighties! Of course all is limited into the demo version of Zeminator... meh



The worst made cliche endless runner demo version you can ever find. With bad English and no-optimalization! There's nothing new and original to be found here, but who doesn't love to perish the injustice of full version and make the Czech Republic a better (but limited) place to live? Take your demo-weapons and demo-walking stick to save us from full version!



With an amazing music from The Goondock Saint!

Created in Clickteam Fusion engine, distilled by mine fresh urine, watched a lot episodes of The Simpsons, sweated a new God's commandments, burned a thousands of calories and baptized myself. The game with all love from bugs, entertainment (not), originality (not), FULL VERSION, adven- (not), not, no!

I'm familiar with all todays official gaming standards - but as the game is created on Clickteam Fusion engine,
is hard to even have volume setup for sounds and music. Or it is only my procrastination? We'll never know.
But still enjoy the un-original game as best you can. Don't even tell me this game is crap.. i know that!
Thank you!
1135420.supported_languages:
英语*, 捷克语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
